title: EPIC 5: Enforce maxBytes limit before file read (stat-based)

comments.author: gordon
comments.text:
During EPIC 4 planning, identified that maxBytes enforcement should happen before file bytes are loaded into memory. The converter receives bytes already loaded, so the size check is too late to prevent OOM.

Solution: In EPIC 5 indexing pipeline, check file.size via stat BEFORE calling converter.convert(). If file exceeds maxBytes, skip conversion and record TOO_LARGE error without reading file bytes.

This keeps converter API clean (bytes already available) while preventing memory issues.

title: EPIC 13: Raycast extension (macOS GUI layer)

comments.author: gordon
comments.text:
## Summary

A native macOS Raycast extension providing GUI access to GNO's core capabilities: search, semantic query, ask, and quick capture. Raycast is ideal because it's keyboard-driven, React/TypeScript-based (same stack as GNO), and deeply integrated into macOS workflows.

## Why Raycast

1. **Same tech stack** - React + TypeScript + Node, minimal context switch
2. **Keyboard-first** - matches CLI power-user mindset
3. **Native performance** - no Electron overhead, instant access via hotkey
4. **Rich UI primitives** - List, Detail, Form, Grid, Actions, Menu Bar
5. **AI integration** - built-in hooks for AI features (useAI)
6. **Large ecosystem** - 5000+ extensions, proven patterns to follow

## Core Commands

### 1. Search Notes (gno search)
- Component: List with search bar
- Features: Instant FTS search, tag filtering, collection scoping
- Actions: Open in editor, Quick Look preview, copy content/path

### 2. Semantic Search (gno vsearch)
- Component: List with search bar
- Features: Vector similarity, hybrid mode toggle, relevance scores

### 3. Ask Question (gno ask)
- Component: Form then Detail
- Flow: Question input then streaming answer with citations
- Features: Citation links, copy answer, regenerate, view context

### 4. Quick Capture
- Component: Form with title, content, collection, tags

### 5. Browse Collections
- Component: List chain (Collections, Documents, Detail)
- Features: Collection stats, document metadata, trigger re-index

### 6. Status Dashboard (Menu Bar)
- Features: Index health, last sync, quick actions, model status

## Technical Architecture

Integration via CLI wrapper (spawn gno commands, parse JSON).
Later: direct library import or MCP client.

## Implementation Tasks

1. T13.1: Raycast extension scaffold
2. T13.2: GNO CLI wrapper with JSON parsing
3. T13.3: Search command (FTS)
4. T13.4: Semantic search command
5. T13.5: Ask command with streaming
6. T13.6: Quick capture form
7. T13.7: Browse collections
8. T13.8: Menu bar status
9. T13.9: Raycast Store submission

## Resources

- Raycast Developer Docs: https://developers.raycast.com
- Extensions Repo: https://github.com/raycast/extensions
- Obsidian Extension (reference): https://www.raycast.com/marcjulian/obsidian
